Package edu.umich.auth.cosign

Interface Summary
CosignConfig.UpdateListener This interface provides a callback to notify registered classes whenever the config file is reloaded.
 

Class Summary
CosignAuthenticationFilter This class extends AuthenticationFilter in order to provide a built-in JAAS configuration for CosignServletCallbackHandler and CosignLoginModule.
CosignConfig This singleton class is the in-memory configurations of the Cosign filter.
CosignCookie This class is responsible for the encoding/decoding of a Cosign Cookie.
CosignLoginModule A JAAS LoginModule for Cosign authentication.
CosignPrincipal This class stores the user name, realm, ip address, and "last validated" timestamp of the current cosign user.
CosignServer This class represents a Cosign server and its connection pool config.
CosignServletCallbackHandler This class implements ServletCallbackHandler and is resposible for setting the cosign service cookie and redirecting the user to the login URL.
